body_html:
@gunan, have you ever seen this? I would basically suggest reinstalling cuda and cudnn in the more standard locations of /usr/local/cuda/..., but it appears it is finding them but you are getting these errors:

/usr/bin/ld: skipping incompatible /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.6 when searching for -l:libcudnn.so.6
/usr/bin/ld: skipping incompatible /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.6 when searching for -l:libcudnn.so.6
/usr/bin/ld: skipping incompatible //usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.6 when searching for -l:libcudnn.so.6
/usr/bin/ld: skipping incompatible //usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.6 when searching for -l:libcudnn.so.6
body_text:
@gunan, have you ever seen this? I would basically suggest reinstalling cuda and cudnn in the more standard locations of /usr/local/cuda/..., but it appears it is finding them but you are getting these errors:
/usr/bin/ld: skipping incompatible /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.6 when searching for -l:libcudnn.so.6
/usr/bin/ld: skipping incompatible /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.6 when searching for -l:libcudnn.so.6
/usr/bin/ld: skipping incompatible //usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.6 when searching for -l:libcudnn.so.6
/usr/bin/ld: skipping incompatible //usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.6 when searching for -l:libcudnn.so.6
body:
@gunan, have you ever seen this? I would basically suggest reinstalling cuda and cudnn in the more standard locations of /usr/local/cuda/..., but it appears it is finding them but you are getting these errors:
```
/usr/bin/ld: skipping incompatible /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.6 when searching for -l:libcudnn.so.6
/usr/bin/ld: skipping incompatible /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.6 when searching for -l:libcudnn.so.6
/usr/bin/ld: skipping incompatible //usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.6 when searching for -l:libcudnn.so.6
/usr/bin/ld: skipping incompatible //usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.6 when searching for -l:libcudnn.so.6
```
